title: Champions to get out of bronze
body: This isn't a QQ im stuck in elo hell thread. I just want to be able to catch up to my friend who always laughs because im in bronze IV/III/II. I dont want challenjour, I just want a champion that can help me get out of bronze. I have no ranked ambitions after that.

replies.body:
Learning ANY champion to a competent level will get you out of Bronze.

"real" ranked doesn't actually begin til Silver. If you are in bronze, it's Riot's way of saying "hey there buddy, you shouldn't have played ranked". Why do you think Bronze people don't get borders LOL

But seriously, learn the game more than just "kill people".

For me, split-push Nasus got me from Bronze 2 to Silver 3 when I first started playing ranked.

you should try play a bronze account at the moment dude. I understand you might be good but you cant carry your team when you get 2 afk's every promo. Too many trolls that's why I find it easier to duo queue with someone so then you know you have 2 people to try carry if you get trolls

Agree with BarryButcher. It really just depends on your play style and preferred lanes (although if you're playing ranked, you should have at least a couple of champs mastered for each lane). I got to Silver with Blitz/Thresh support, and Cho/Warwick jungle.
